snippet.title: Miner Mayem - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Pickaxe ready? Coal, iron, gold & diamond! 18 Miners to unlock! Getcha' chop!

Get chopping in this action packed, arcade style game. You are a miner, sent to the deepest depths of the mine in search of gold, silver, diamonds, and other precious ores. Get the treasures while avoiding the falling rock. 4 random environments and 18 unique miners to unlock. Chop til you drop!

Developed by Anarchy Enterprises

#retrogaming #retrogames #steam #steamgames #steamgame #minermayhem

FUN FACT: Perhaps the game's most helpful Steam user review pretty much sums up Miner Mayhem in one paragraph:
"Rip-off of Timberman that replaces the (more logical) tree trunks and branches with ore textures that look like they've been ripped straight from a 32x32 minecraft texture pack."
https://steamcommunity.com/id/twurl/recommended/402850/
